name: Acceptable Conditions
description:
Acceptable Conditions is the final submission for my Major Studio 1 class at The New School. Thanks to my faculty and friends for their guidance and support.

Credits

Produced, developed, written, and designed by Jason Li

Tracery by Kate Compton

Tracery Unity Implementation by 5ive Bullet Games
